Introduction

IZ (Korean: 아이즈; Japanese: アイズ) is a four-member band that debuted in August 31, 2017, under Music K Entertainment. The group is composed of Junyoung, Jihoo, Hyunjun, Woosu.


In 2018, IZ won the New Hallyu Rookie Award in Soribada Best K-Music Awards
